title: Simple Past 2
description: Learn past tense using 上週 and 上個週末.

steps.pinyin: wǒ shàng zhōu kàn le diàn yǐng.
steps.english_hint: I watched a movie last week.

steps.pinyin: wǒ shàng zhōu mǎi le xīn yī fú.
steps.english_hint: I bought new clothes last week.

steps.pinyin: wǒ shàng zhōu mò qù le hǎi biān.
steps.english_hint: I went to the beach last weekend.

steps.pinyin: wǒ shàng zhōu mò yùn dòng le.
wǒ shàng zhōu xiě le bào gào.
steps.english_hint: I wrote a report last week.

steps.pinyin: wǒ shàng zhōu zhǔ le xīn de liào lǐ.
steps.english_hint: I cooked a new dish last week.

steps.pinyin: wǒ shàng zhōu wán le zhuō yóu.
steps.english_hint: I played board games last week.

steps.pinyin: wǒ shàng zhōu mò shuì de hěn duō.
steps.english_hint: I slept a lot last weekend.

steps.pinyin: wǒ shàng zhōu mǎi le lǐ wù.
steps.english_hint: I bought a gift last week.

steps.pinyin: wǒ shàng zhōu tīng le yí gè gù shì.
steps.english_hint: I listened to a story last week.

review.summary: You practiced past tense for last week and last weekend.
